title: What time do Glastonbury tickets go on sale on Sunday?
text:
Will you be here next summer? (Picture: Getty Images)

Whether it’s a pop princess like Kylie, an underground supernova like Stormzy or, er, David Attenborough, there really is something for everyone at Glastonbury.

But there isn’t always a ticket for everyone.

Want to secure your spot? Here’s how…

Have Glastonbury tickets sold out?

The coach package tickets sold out in under 30 minutes when they went on sale on Thursday 3 October.

But that doesn’t mean your Glasto 2020 dreams are dashed.

Standard weekend tickets without the coach travel included go on sale this Sunday.

What time do Glastonbury 2020 tickets go on sale?

Tickets go on sale Sunday 6 October at 9am sharp.

Tickets can only be bought on the official Glastonbury seetickets website.

Might be a good week to have a quiet Saturday night in or it won’t be easy like Sunday morning getting up for a ticket.

Stormzy’s set was instantly iconic. Who will deliver the goods in 2020? (Picture: Getty Images)

What will you need to buy Glastonbury 2020 tickets?

Advertisement

Advertisement

Sorry to break the news but if you hadn’t already registered by Monday 30 September, you’ll have to wait for Glasto 2021.

So touts can’t resell tickets at ridiculous prices, all tickets are personalised to the person who holds them.

If you are buying tickets for multiple people, they’ll have to be registered already too.

Glasto always has music’s biggest names, like Miley and Lil Nas X (Picture: Getty Images)

‘You will need their registration numbers and corresponding postcodes in order to purchase tickets on their behalf,’ the website says.

If you’ve registered, all you’ll need Sunday morning is your credit or debit card details to pay the £50 deposit.

How to get Glastonbury resale tickets

If you miss out on a ticket the first time, there could still be a chance of getting one.

The coach resale will take place on Thursday 16th April 2020 followed by the main resale, on Sunday 19th April 2020.

Lizzo had a life-affirming stormer of a set (Picture: Getty Images)

When is Glastonbury 2020?

Glastonbury Festival is from Wednesday, June 24 to Sunday, June 28 2020.

description: Glastonbury 2020's main ticket sale begins on Sunday but how can you be sure of getting yours?
